name: Classy-Clothes-BD.com
description: This is another fraudulent website impersonating our official Classy Clothes brand. The site uses a hyphenated domain name to appear legitimate but has no connection to our company. It steals our images, branding, and product descriptions to deceive customers.
warningDetails: This fake website has stolen our product catalog and images to create a convincing copy.
The site offers extremely low prices to attract unsuspecting customers.
Contact information on the site is either non-functional or routes to scammers.
Customer information entered on this site may be used for identity theft.
The site lacks proper security certificates and secure payment processing.
The domain was registered only recently, unlike our established official domain.
